message.content:
I need to identify the carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period based on the financial statement.

Looking at the income statement, I can see there's a line item called "Cost of Goods Sold" which represents the cost of inventories that were sold during the period. This is the value I need to extract.

From the income statement section:
| Account | Amount | Date |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Cost of Goods Sold | 6290000.00 | 2024-01-30 |

The carrying amount of inventories sold during the reporting period is 6290000.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '6290000.00'} }
```
